ProductInfo.Features:
GW9732: Professional 32 Channel H.264 960H Real-time DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30fps recording. D1mode/960Hmode30fps playback. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW40WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Outdoor/Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft. IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
GW108M: Professional 1/3" Effio CCD Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft. IR Distance. Vandal proof. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu
Package Includes: GW9732 - 32 channel DVR with 6TB HD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor; 12 x GW40WD - 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera; 12 x GW108M - 1/3" Effio-E CCD Indoor Camera
1 x GW1000RG59: 1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GWP1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box;GWP1209-10A: 1 x 9 ports power box; 24 x Power pigtail (GW082); 24 x Power pigtail (GW132); 48 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 24CHE3 32 Channel H.264 960H Real-Time DVR with 24 x Effio CCD 700 TV Lines and 2.8~12mm Varifocal Lens Security Camera System (White/Black)
